title: Middlekauff – 3 & Out – NFL vs. NBA free agency; Zions in the NFL; AFC South O/U's' Middlekauff Mailbag
itunes:title: Middlekauff – 3 & Out – NFL vs. NBA free agency; Zions in the NFL; AFC South O/U's' Middlekauff Mailbag
description:
Subscribe here to the 3 and Out with John Middlekauff Podcast https://itunes.apple.com/us/podcast/3-and-out-with-john-middlekauff/id1352730623?mt=2.  In this episode, Middlekauff looks at the similarities and differences between NFL and NBA free agency, why QB's are the only position that can have a Zion Williamson-like impact on NFL franchises, AFC South Over/Under picks, and answers listener questions in Middlekauff's Mailbag. Follow John on twitter @JohnMiddlekauff and go to www.theherdnow.com to find the latest content. Subscribe now!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
